thread.title: 80s icon Adam Ant is bringing Antmusic to New Zealand
thread.title_full: 80s icon Adam Ant is bringing Antmusic to New Zealand

author: Danielle McGrane
title: 80s icon Adam Ant is bringing Antmusic to New Zealand
text:
80s icon Adam Ant is bringing Antmusic to New Zealand DANIELLE MCGRANE Last updated 14:54, February 14 2017 
Adam Ant is promising to play every song from his 1980 classic album Kings of the Wild Frontier live on stage and in sequence during a tour of New Zealand. 
The 80s star is celebrating the 35th anniversary of the platinum album which included the single Antmusic 
"I'm really looking forward to performing the Kings of the Wild Frontier album live and in sequence plus my other favourite songs from the repertoire," Adam said. Kevin Cummins 
80s icon Adam Ant has two shows planned for New Zealand. 
The album was notable for its use of Central African drumming which created the Burundi Beat beat style which the popstar has brought to his live shows by incorporating two drummers into his band.
